description:
✂  Tools & Supplies I Recommend: https://goo.gl/Y7KKhY
$  Join the "Fellowship" on Patreon: https://goo.gl/ZZ4vBf

This week I review some self adhesive static grass tufts by War World Scenics that I purchased to enhance the look of my Dungeons & Dragons miniatures.

PURCHASE THE GRASS TUFTS:
(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

USA

Spring (4mm): http://amzn.to/2D3pHZR
Autumn (4mm): http://amzn.to/2CJ1WIP
Dead (6mm): http://amzn.to/2D2rXAu
More Options: http://amzn.to/2qynRgZ

Canada

Spring (4mm): http://amzn.to/2CxPF6x
Autumn (4mm): http://amzn.to/2CLIhaT
Dead (6mm): http://amzn.to/2D2rKxc
More Options: http://amzn.to/2D1GHzA

UK

As these are manufactured in the UK you can purchase directly from the manufacturer: https://goo.gl/qJDmSX

title: Static Grass Tufts by WWS - Review (Black Magic Craft Episode 071)
